game.beginning: In a world where magic has disappeared, humanity is on the brink of destruction. The last remnants of society are fighting for survival in a harsh environment.
game.ending: With the return of magic, the people begin to rebuild their world and create a new future free from the suffering of the past.
game.synopsis:
The game follows the story of a young orphan named Eira who discovers she has the ability to wield the ancient magic that once flowed through the world. As she embarks on a journey to uncover her origins, Eira finds herself caught in the midst of a brewing conflict between rival factions vying for control over the remaining resources.

With the help of a ragtag group of allies, including a battle-hardened warrior and a cunning thief, Eira must navigate treacherous landscapes, avoid deadly creatures, and overcome her own doubts to unlock the secrets of magic and save humanity from extinction.

But as she delves deeper into the mysteries of the past, Eira realizes that her destiny is intertwined with an ancient prophecy that foretells the return of a powerful being who will bring about either salvation or destruction.
game.title: Echoes of Eternity
